summary: Support Ticket System testing complete. All 14 backend API tests passed (100% success rate). Frontend Admin Support UI verified working with ticket list, detail view with AI draft, and Knowledge Base CRUD. AI classification using GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key is working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Support routes properly extracted to /app/backend/routes/support.py (616 lines)
Support service with AI classification in /app/backend/services/support_service.py (877 lines)
Pydantic models for tickets in /app/backend/models/support.py (237 lines)
AdminSupport.jsx component (986 lines) - well structured with proper data-testid attributes
Contact form endpoint (/api/contact) properly integrated with SupportService for ticket creation
AI classification uses GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key - working correctly with 93% confidence scores
Sequential ticket numbering (CCE-0001, CCE-0002, etc.) working correctly
seed_data_creation: Created test tickets and KB articles during testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Support Ticket System fully implemented and tested. Routes: /api/support/tickets (public), /api/support/admin/* (admin only), /api/support/admin/kb/* (KB CRUD), /api/support/meta/* (categories/statuses/priorities). AI classification and draft response generation working with GPT-5.2. Admin UI at /admin -> Support tab shows tickets list, detail view with AI draft, and Knowledge Base management.

support_public.POST /api/support/tickets: PASS - Creates ticket with AI classification and draft

support_admin.GET /api/support/admin/tickets/{id}: PASS - Returns full ticket detail with AI draft

api_tests_passed: POST /api/support/tickets - Create ticket with AI classification
GET /api/support/admin/tickets with filters - Status, priority, search
GET /api/support/admin/tickets/{id} - Get ticket detail with AI draft

frontend_ui_verified.admin_support_tab: PASS - Support tab visible in Admin panel
frontend_ui_verified.stats_cards: PASS - Total Tickets, Awaiting Review, Open, Resolved Today
frontend_ui_verified.tickets_list: PASS - Shows ticket number, subject, status, priority, AI confidence
frontend_ui_verified.ticket_detail: PASS - Shows user info, conversation, AI draft with Regenerate/Edit buttons
frontend_ui_verified.knowledge_base_tab: PASS - Shows KB articles with Active/Inactive status
frontend_ui_verified.add_article_modal: PASS - Form with Question, Answer, Category, Active toggle

ai_integration.classification: Working - GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key
ai_integration.draft_response: Working - Generates professional responses with confidence scores

mocked_apis.note: No mocked APIs - AI classification uses real GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key
